frame.name: Forgoing
frame.definition:
<def-root>A<fen>Forgoer</fen> decides not to partake in something ordinary that is otherwise <fen>Desirable</fen>.
<ex><fex name="For">Chuck</fex> often <t>skips</t> <fex name="Des">lunch</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Forgoer
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Forgoer</fen> decides not to partake in the desirable activity or event. <ex><fex name="For">Chuck</fex> often <t>skips</t> lunch.</ex></def-root >

FE.name: Desirable
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Desirable</fen> identifies the event or activity in which is the <fen>Forgoer</fen> does not partake.
<ex>Chuck often <t>skips</t> <fex name="Des">lunch</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the forgoing occurs. </def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> the forgoing occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the forgoing occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the forgoing occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which the the forgoing occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the forgoing occurs.
</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Explanation</fen> for which the forgoing occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the <fen>Forgoer</fen> does not partake in the <fen>Desirable</fen>.
<ex>Chuck <t>skips</t> lunch <fex name="Circumstances">even when he's hungry</fex>.</ex></def-root>
